alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Northern Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 3:27PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN AITKIN, SOUTHWESTERN ST. LOUIS AND NORTHWESTERN CARLTON COUNTIES THROUGH 345 PM CDT... At 327 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Floodwood, or 14 miles northeast of Big Sandy Lake, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Floodwood around 340 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. This storm may intensify. Monitor local NOAA Weather Radio, commercial radio, or television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northeastern and east central Minnesota.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Northern Aitkin
